20110111000657.000|20110111000700.000|CC1|BEEN DAMAGED.

20110111000703.000|20110111000705.000|CC1|HOW AN INCH OR TWO TO THE       
20110111000705.000|20110111000706.000|CC1|RIGHT WOULD HAVE EASILY

20110111001556.000|20110111001600.000|CC1|        the leading part.       
20110111001600.000|20110111001602.000|CC1|   ADVAIR is clinically proven  
20110111001602.000|20110111001602.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110111001602.000|20110111001605.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110111001605.000|20110111001607.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110111001607.000|20110111001607.000|CC1|         VAVAIR contains        
20110111001607.000|20110111001609.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110111001609.000|20110111001609.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110111001609.000|20110111001611.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110111001611.000|20110111001612.000|CC1|        working together        
20110111001612.000|20110111001612.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110111001612.000|20110111001615.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110111001615.000|20110111001615.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110111001615.000|20110111001617.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110111001617.000|20110111001619.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110111001619.000|20110111001619.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110111001619.000|20110111001621.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110111001621.000|20110111001621.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110111001621.000|20110111001623.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110111001623.000|20110111001623.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110111001623.000|20110111001625.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110111001625.000|20110111001625.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110111001625.000|20110111001628.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110111001628.000|20110111001629.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20110111001629.000|20110111001629.000|CC1|  Tell your doctor if you have  
20110111001629.000|20110111001631.000|CC1|        a heart ndndition       
20110111001631.000|20110111001631.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20110111001631.000|20110111001634.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20110111001634.000|20110111001634.000|CC1|     If you're still having     
20110111001634.000|20110111001636.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,     
20110111001636.000|20110111001637.000|CC1|         take the lead.         
20110111001637.000|20110111001637.000|CC1|       Ask your doctor if       
20110111001637.000|20110111001639.000|CC1|        including ADVAIR        
20110111001639.000|20110111001639.000|CC1|       could help improve       
20110111001639.000|20110111001641.000|CC1|       your lung function.
